house_in_HEX:
	{0x18, 0x3C, 0x7E, 0xFF, 0x4A, 0x4A, 0x4E, 0x4E};
BIN(0x18) 0b00011000
BIN(0x3C) 0b00111100
BIN(0x7E) 0b01111110
BIN(0xFF) 0b11111111
BIN(0x4A) 0b01001010
BIN(0x4A) 0b01001010
BIN(0x4E) 0b01001110
BIN(0x4E) 0b01001110

houseInverted_in_BIN: 
	{0b00001000, 0b11111100, 0b00001110, 0b00001111, 0b11111111, 0b11001110, 0b11111100, 0b00001000};
houseInverted_in_HEX: 
	{0x8, 0xFC, 0xE, 0xF, 0xFF, 0xCE, 0xFC, 0x8};
	
HEX(0b00001000) 0x8
HEX(0b11111100) 0xFC
HEX(0b00001110) 0xE
HEX(0b00001111) 0xF
HEX(0b11111111) 0xFF
HEX(0b11001110) 0xCE
HEX(0b11111100) 0xFC
HEX(0b00001000) 0x8
